    <metadata>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Van Gogh és Hiroshige</string>
            <string language="en">Van Gogh and Hiroshige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Van Gogh und Hiroshige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Van Gogh et Hiroshige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Camionete Gogh e Hiroshige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Van Gogh e Hiroshige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Van Gogh και Hiroshige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Van Gogh e Hiroshige</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Van Gogh és Hiroshige képeinek szétválogatása</string>
            <string language="en">Sort pictures of Van Gogh and Hiroshige</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">quattrocento,  Firenze,  Botticelli, Sandro,  Primavera,  animáció,  három grácia,  Vénusz,  Zephyr,  Chloris,  Merkúr,  </string>
            <string language="en">quattrocento,  Florence,  Botticelli, Sandro,  Primavera,  simulationn,  The three Graces,  Venus,  Zephyr,  Chloris,  Merkur,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sortierungabbildungen von Van Gogh und von 
Hiroshige</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Images de tri de Van Gogh et de Hiroshige</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retratos da sorte de Camionete Gogh e de Hiroshige</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagini di ordinamento di Van Gogh e di 
Hiroshige</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνες είδους Van Gogh και Hiroshige</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadros de la clase de Van Gogh y de Hiroshige</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">quattrocento, Florenz, Botticelli, Sandro, Primavera, 
simulationn, die drei Umgangsformen, Venus, Zephyr, Chloris, Merkur,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">quattrocento, Florence, Botticelli, Sandro, Primavera, 
simulationn, les trois graces, Venus, Zephyr, Chloris, Merkur,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quattrocento, Florença, Botticelli, Sandro, Primavera, 
simulationn, os três graces, Venus, Zephyr, Chloris, Merkur,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quattrocento, Firenze, Botticelli, Sandro, Primavera, 
simulationn, tre tolleranze, Venus, Zephyr, Chloris, Merkur,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το quattrocento, Φλωρεντία, Botticelli, Sandro, 
Primavera, simulationn, τα τρία κοσμεί, Αφροδίτη, Zephyr, 
Chloris, Merkur,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">quattrocento, Florencia, Botticelli, Sandro, Primavera, 
simulationn, las tres tolerancias, Venus, Zephyr, Chloris, Merkur,</string>
